About Me

Few things you need to know...

BIO

I enjoy solving data related problems using tools I am familiar with (Microsoft stack, Pyhton,...). More than that, I enjoy the process of learning new technologies that help addressing these challenges.

Business & Decision

Data Engineer

Working closely with clients and helping them make a better use of their data. Building data pipeline to ingest, store and transform data. Providing the right solution whether it is on premise or cloud, relational or not, small or large volume.
